content: this listing is for a pdf download of two knitting patterns patterns are written in english these patterns includes sizes newborn small medium large supplies needed for pullover sweater approx 200-375 yards 180-340 meters worsted weight yarn yarn brands used are given in the pattern size 8 5mm circular needles size 8 5mm dpns double pointed needles stitch markers x5 stitch holder x2 yarn needle supplies needed for baby bloomer shorts worsted weight yarn approx 200-375 yards/180-340 meters yarn brands used are given in the pattern size 8 5mm straight needles size 8 5mm circular needles size 8 5mm dpns double pointed needles crochet hook & scrap yarn for provisional cast on stitch marker stitch holder yarn needle skill level intermediate this pattern is copyright protected and cannot be changed sold or reproduced in any way you cannot sell the pattern but you are welcome to sell any of the items made from my patterns text and images copyright c 2023 by rebecca cramer simply sycamore designs all rights reserved by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms above
